headline: Where Does Amgen Stand After 15% Surge and New Pipeline Approvals in 2025?
summary: Thinking about whether Amgen is a smart buy at today's prices? You are not alone, especially if you are trying to figure out if the current stock price reflects true value or hype. Amgen's share price has surged recently, up 5.1% in the last week and 15.0% over the past month, with year-to-date returns sitting at an impressive 29.7%. Part of this momentum can be traced to news around major pipeline drug approvals and fresh partnerships that have caught investor attention. Ongoing discussions...
